arts.ttl: Napoli thrashed 6-2 by PSV in Champions League matchday 3
arts.sum: Nightmare night for Antonio Conte’s Napoli. On the third matchday of the Champions League, after losing their second Serie A game to Torino 1-0, the Neapolitans suffered a shocking and historic defeat away to Sergino Dest's teammates at PSV Eindhoven, who won with a tennis-like score of 6-2. A crushing result for morale, the standings […]

arts.ttl: Champions League | PSV 6-2 Napoli: Conte's side collapse in Eindhoven
arts.sum: Napoli had taken the lead in Eindhoven, but crumbled beyond recognition to a 6-2 Champions League defeat against PSV with Lorenzo Lucca sent off.
